Title: [NOC] 100 points of ID User Verification & Architecture Design
Description:
Feature Description
This feature includes the following regarding the external portal users 100 points ID:
  • Pre-work / setup with DEWR
  • User verification through myID - 100 points of ID (myID).  Note: Users will use B2C for authentication.
  • Alternative method for user verification
    • NOTE: The Portal user ID verification design must also include an alternative option to the My Gov ID verification option i.e. portal users must have 2 options to select from to verify their ID.
  • Other architectural design considerations
